name: ups And
scenarioDescription:
The ups And Exoplanetary System


Overview

ups And is a star with 1.3 times the mass of the Sun, and 1.56 times its radius. It is located 43.74 light years away from the solar system and is estimated to be 5 billion years old, as compared to the Sun which is roughly 4.6 billion years old.

ups And is known to have 3 exoplanets in orbit around it.


Exoplanets in the ups And system


ups And b

ups And b was discovered by the Lick Observatory observatory using the radial velocity method. Its semi-major axis is 0.06 astronomical units, as compared to Earth's which is 1 astronomical unit. The mass of ups And b is 218.6568 times the mass of Earth. At more than 50 Earth masses, ups And b is a gas giant, a planet whose mass is mostly made up of hydrogen and helium, like Jupiter and Saturn in our solar system.


ups And c

ups And c was discovered by the Multiple Observatories observatory using the radial velocity method. Its semi-major axis is 0.83 astronomical units, as compared to Earth's which is 1 astronomical unit. The mass of ups And c is 629.9580000000001 times the mass of Earth. At more than 50 Earth masses, ups And c is a gas giant, a planet whose mass is mostly made up of hydrogen and helium, like Jupiter and Saturn in our solar system.


ups And d

ups And d was discovered by the Multiple Observatories observatory using the radial velocity method. Its semi-major axis is 2.51 astronomical units, as compared to Earth's which is 1 astronomical unit. The mass of ups And d is 1313.9759999999999 times the mass of Earth. At more than 50 Earth masses, ups And d is a gas giant, a planet whose mass is mostly made up of hydrogen and helium, like Jupiter and Saturn in our solar system.
description: 3D visualisation and gravity simulation of the exoplanet system ups And, which contains 3 planets and was discovered by Lick Observatory.
